comment: Gab deserves to be shut down for a while. The anti-semites, race-baiters, white supremicists, and bat-shit crazy conspiracy theorists need a time out like the children they are. Hopefully, when it returns, Gab will have found a better way to handle vile extremists.
amr:

(m / multi-sentence

            :ARG1 (t2 / time
                  :mod (o2 / out))

                        :domain a)))
      :snt3 (h / hope-01
            :ARG1 (f / find-01
                  :ARG0 (p6 / person
                        :name (n4 / name
                              :op1 "Gab"))
                  :ARG1 (w3 / way

                                    :ARG1 w3)
                              :ARG3 (m2 / more))
                        :manner-of (h3 / handle-01
                              :ARG0 p6
                              :ARG1 (e2 / extremist
                                    :ARG1-of (v / vile-02))))
                  :time (r3 / return-01
